patch 8.2.1281: the "trailing characters" error can be hard to understand

Problem:    The "trailing characters" error can be hard to understand.
Solution:   Add the trailing characters to the message.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/6c4bfe4b31e8c5d3c4809536ab6e4835d50f0f67|patch 8.2.1282: Vim9: crash when using CheckScriptFailure()>
patch 8.2.1282: Vim9: crash when using CheckScriptFailure()

Problem:    Vim9: crash when using CheckScriptFailure() in
            Test_vim9script_call_fail_decl().
Solution:   Do not decrement the def_functions len unless the function was
            newly added.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1282: Vim9: crash when using CheckScriptFailure() · vim/vim@6c4bfe4
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1282: Vim9: crash when using CheckScriptFailure() · vim/vim@6c4bfe4
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: crash when using CheckScriptFailure() in Test_vim9script_call_fail_decl(). Solution: Do not decrement the def_functions len unless the function was newly...

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/637cd7d1c9fa0ee47951ccdc310a388cb7ecfada|patch 8.2.1283: Vim9: error for misplaced -> lacks argument>
patch 8.2.1283: Vim9: error for misplaced -> lacks argument

Problem:    Vim9: error for misplaced -> lacks argument.
Solution:   Use the pointer before it was advanced.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1283: Vim9: error for misplaced -> lacks argument · vim/vim@637cd7d
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1283: Vim9: error for misplaced -> lacks argument · vim/vim@637cd7d
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: error for misplaced -> lacks argument. Solution: Use the pointer before it was advanced.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/bfba8651a51b66fdc52848f32c77aa925586e250|patch 8.2.1284: Vim9: skipping over type includes following white space>
patch 8.2.1284: Vim9: skipping over type includes following white space

Problem:    Vim9: skipping over type includes following white space, leading
            to an error for missing white space.
Solution:   Do not skip over white space after the type.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1284: Vim9: skipping over type includes following white space · vim/vim@bfba865
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1284: Vim9: skipping over type includes following white space · vim/vim@bfba865
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: skipping over type includes following white space, leading to an error for missing white space. Solution: Do not skip over white space after the type.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/b8070e31736decfcdf8dd47997882cb8f5a64c9d|patch 8.2.1285: Vim9: argument types are not checked on assignment>
patch 8.2.1285: Vim9: argument types are not checked on assignment

Problem:    Vim9: argument types are not checked on assignment.
Solution:   Check function argument types. (issue #6507)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1285: Vim9: argument types are not checked on assignment · vim/vim@b8070e3
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1285: Vim9: argument types are not checked on assignment · vim/vim@b8070e3
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: argument types are not checked on assignment. Solution: Check function argument types. (issue #6507)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/43e969d3f98766824c18d20b84f2fab00feef683|patch 8.2.1286: Vim9: No error when using a type to a window variable>
patch 8.2.1286: Vim9: No error when using a type to a window variable

Problem:    Vim9: No error when using a type to a window variable
Solution:   Recognize the syntax and give an error. (closes #6521)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1286: Vim9: No error when using a type to a window variable · vim/vim@43e969d
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1286: Vim9: No error when using a type to a window variable · vim/vim@43e969d
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: No error when using a type to a window variable Solution: Recognize the syntax and give an error. (closes #6521)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/40f4f7a48cae491f83bd3cdbf7e9b5a23ed870ef|patch 8.2.1287: Vim9: crash when using an imported function>
patch 8.2.1287: Vim9: crash when using an imported function

Problem:    Vim9: crash when using an imported function.
Solution:   Add the function type to the imported entry. (closes #6522)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1287: Vim9: crash when using an imported function · vim/vim@40f4f7a
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1287: Vim9: crash when using an imported function · vim/vim@40f4f7a
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: crash when using an imported function. Solution: Add the function type to the imported entry. (closes #6522)
